alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Irwin; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 11:10AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cook, Irwin, Berrien, eastern Colquitt and central Tift Counties through 1215 PM EST... At 1110 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Tifton to near Unionville to 7 miles west of Adel. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Nashville, Adel, Ocilla, Sparks, Enigma, Lenox, Alapaha, Mystic, Unionville, Phillipsburg, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Eldorado, Gladys, Massee, Osierfield, Glory, Flat Ford and Harding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for south central Georgia.
